name: Neo Heroes (Completed)
description:
Neo Heroes is an action, hack-n-slash where 1-4 players enter the nightclub in order to fight back against the evil boogie-men that have taken over.

Make sure to destroy as many of them as possible in order to gain as many points as you can, and if you play with other friends, compete to see who the greatest fighter is!

Don't forget to combine your moves, as you are able to perform a new move by combining your dash with the attack button!

Game is highly recommended to use a controller with

Controls - KBM

Attack - J

Special - K

Dash - Space

Movement - WASD

Pause/Spawn/Respawn - Enter

You will find the controls in game for controller
